outcomesData.heading: Improve patient experience
outcomesData.info: Lana's bedside assistant engages and entertains patients, delivering comfort and care when patients need it the most.

outcomesData.heading: Higher HCAHPS, lower readmissions
outcomesData.info: Improve HCAHPS scores and reduce hospital readmissions by achieving better health literacy and improved patient satisfaction.

outcomesData.heading: Streamline nurse workflows
outcomesData.info: With our integrations with existing clinical communication platforms, Lana routes patient requests to the right care team member, increasing staff efficiency while prioritizing patient needs.

outcomesData.heading: Increase care plan adherence
outcomesData.info: Lana helps improve care plan adherence through smart incentives, medication and appointment reminders, and a seamless post-discharge journey.
